channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16592] Unify Delete request with AP
item.description: This is the first step try to unify the HTable with AP only, to extend AP could process single action, i introduced AbstractResponse, multiResponse and singleResponse (introduced to deal with single result) will extend this class.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

This message was automatically generated.

28	  public static int SINGLE = 1;

29	  public static int MULTI = 2;

Consider introducing enum for the above.

There is extraneous import of math.Sin - please remove.

Please drop this:


36	import org.apache.avro.generic.GenericData;

Thanks Ted Yu for you review.
what do you think about the way i unify the single action with AP, there is also another way that is we just take single action request as a special multi action request, and do some tricks in ResponseConverter. which way do you think is better? Ted Yu Andrew Purtell
rebase on master, and address Ted Yu nice suggestions.

Failed testcases has no relates with the patch, all could pass locally. Ted Yu any chance +1 here? It is a blocker to move on

Looks good overall.
Since AbstractResponse is marked Private, the following is not needed:


+  @InterfaceAudience.Private

+  public enum ResponseType {



+    SINGLE    (0),

+    MULTI       (1);

nit: please align the ordinal values.


+        CompareType compareType = null;

+        if (compareOp != null) {

The above is needed after unification ?
Address Ted Yu new comments, thanks.
